activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11760
activity.text:
Hi @Jacobjeevan.
Could you please assign this to me? I already have a fix for it. 

**Describe your solution clearly:**
1.	Make the phone number div a flexbox.
2.	Give it a flex direction of column.
3.	Align the items in the flex box to the end. This will align the phone number and its value to the far right of the card. 

**Expected Timeline:**
- End date: 24 hours from time of assignment 

**Additional Context:**
This approach works for all screen sizes. See screenshot below to see what the end result would look like. 

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/986ca4ae-0e9b-4e9d-8439-08fe1d3b72b9)

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11760
activity.text: Phone Number on User Card is Misaligned
